pr_title: Moved tenant management code into a new package

timeline.message: Added license header to new class

timeline.bodyText: Why don't we need to need to check if the app has been destroyed in the tenant manager?
timeline.author: micahstairs

replies.bodyText: I think this is something we ought to get rid of from the entire codebase. FirebaseAuth is the only class that does this today. I think it's fair to not do it in any new classes.
replies.author: hiranya911

timeline.bodyText: This variable is no longer needed now that doDestroy is a no-op.
timeline.author: micahstairs

timeline.bodyText: Did you purposefully omit some error codes from this map? e.g. TENANT_ID_MISMATCH
timeline.author: micahstairs

replies.bodyText: Yes. That's not a real error code sent by the Auth backend.
replies.author: hiranya911

timeline.bodyText: Should we use a broader term than "user management backend service" if this is being used for tenant/provider-related requests too?
timeline.author: micahstairs

timeline.bodyText: Should we use a broader term than "User management service" if this is being used for tenant/provider-related requests too?
timeline.author: micahstairs

timeline.bodyText: Wouldn't it be nice to keep all of these constants in one place? AuthHttpClient is a good spot to keep them. And it appears INTERNAL_ERROR is currently being duplicated both here and AuthHttpClient.
timeline.author: micahstairs

replies.bodyText: Moved the remaining 2 error codes to AuthHttpClient
replies.author: hiranya911

timeline.bodyText: Can getTenantUrlSuffix be removed now that the tenant-related methods have been removed?
timeline.author: micahstairs

timeline.bodyText: Consolidate these errors in AuthHttpClient? INTERNAL_ERROR is currently being duplicated across both.
timeline.author: micahstairs
micahstairs

timeline.bodyText: Rename this variable to tenantClient. It's not a FirebaseUserManager anywmore!
timeline.author: micahstairs
micahstairs
micahstairs

replies.bodyText: There are tests in this file that makes tenant-aware user management calls.
replies.author: hiranya911

timeline.author: micahstairs

timeline.bodyText: Use a static import for Assert.assertEquals?
timeline.author: micahstairs

timeline.message: Responding to code review comments: Consolidated error codes in AuthHttpClient
